global_caption: a scene featuring a young man wearing a white shirt, black sunglasses, beige pants, and black shoes looking at a woman holding a camera, a fatty woman with long hair holding a cup of coffee in her left hand and luggage in her right hand, a young man wearing a green T-shirt, beige short pants, and black sneakers with a gray watch on his left wrist holding something in both hands and watching the girl who holds the camera, and a woman with long hair wearing a bright blue-colored one-piece holding a camera in her left hand and taking a photo while holding a hat in her right hand.
region_captions: a young man wearing a white shirt, black sunglasses, beige pants, and black shoes is looking at a woman who is holding a camera, with his left hand in his pocket, with a watch on his left wrist. He is holding a map in his right hand.

a fatty woman with long hair is holding a cup of coffee in her left hand and luggage in her right hand. She is wearing a flower-patterned dress, short jeans, and sandals. She is looking at the woman who holds the camera.

a young man wearing a green T-shirt, beige short pants, and black sneakers has a gray watch on his left wrist and is holding something in both hands, with his hands in a pocket. He is interestingly watching the girl who holds the camera.
a woman with long hair is wearing a bright blue-colored one-piece and sandals, holding a camera in her left hand and taking a photo. She is also holding a hat in her right hand.
